alert.note: Alert for East Central Tularosa Basin, Alamogordo; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southeast Tularosa Basin; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 21 at 3:55PM MST until December 22 at 9:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Areas of patchy fog with local visibility down to 1/4 to 1/2 mile in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...Lowland and valley locations of south central and southwest New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog is not expected to be as widespread, or last as long as it on Thursday. However, some valley areas could see visibility below 1/4 mile.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: East Central Tularosa Basin, Alamogordo; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southeast Tularosa Basin; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands
